name: Discovery RPG
description:
Discovery RPG is a showcase for a new RPG being developed by Haven Studios

A small team that loves games; but just can't find the right game they want to play. So we have worked tireless for a long time.  Finally ready for some directed feedback on the core game-play in a tiny little demo world.

You may Discovery this game is  not even a game, and not even a world.  But I hope the concept really drives your curiosity to discover something new soon.
